name: Roadtrip (TheRealZFinch)
description:
You play as George. One day your friend Jeff invites you to a roadtrip. You accept the invite and join him on the adventure, but later things take a creepy turn.

Controls:
Walking - Arrows
Jumping - Left shift
Shooting (Requires gun) - Mouse
Taser (Requires taser) - Z
Driving - Arrows (Without left arrow)
Drone fixing level - Arrows
Fullscreen - Q
Window mode - W
Pause - P (Press P again to unpause)
Exit menu - Escape
